title: Patchwork Cover, ca. 1910
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: chromolithography printed on 7 & 1 satin, stitching
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Smith
description: Patchwork cover made of cigarette souvenir squares printed with national flags and birds. The large central flag is from pre-revolutionary Russia and is surrounded by birds and other national flags. Several flag souvenirs read "Zira Cigarettes." Backing is a roller-printed cotton with a design of roses. Edged in silk hairpin lace.

tombstone.epitaph:
